name: Unyielding Wing

weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

advancements: Receive Alyss's support when using any frost weapon skill in the Chilling Field, summoning Alyss to cast a discharge skill on the field, which is the equivalent of Wanderer casting a discharge skill. The skill that triggers the discharge skill will then be used again afterward. Alyss's supporting discharge skill damage is equal to **70%** of her skill's original damage.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Receive Alyss's Support every time Starry Night is triggered and increase Starry Night and Hoarfrost Damage by **10%** for **12** seconds. Stack up to **3** times.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

Increase the damage of Unyielding Wing's normal attack and Spatial Slice by **35%**. The Wanderer receives Alyss's Protection upon taking fatal damage, protecting the Wanderer from death 1 time and making the Wanderer immune to damage for a short time. Cooldown: **60** seconds.
Increase frost damage by **12%** when Alyss's Support reaches 3 stacks.

abilities.name: Swan Arc
abilities.description: While on the ground, use Unyielding Wing to launch 5 consecutive attacks.

abilities.name: Sweeping Combo
abilities.description: While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air and consume endurance.
breakdown: **343.9%** of ATK + **18** to the target and **knock them down**.

abilities.name: Dancing Flash
abilities.description:
While using Swan Arc, tap and hold the normal attack to pull the targets together and deal damage equal **303.9%** of ATK + **16**** to all targets withi range. The last hit **strongly suspends** the target and deals damage eqaul to **95%** of ATK + **5**.

**Passive**: Within **4** seconds after succesfully using any weapon skill or entering Latent State, become immune to damage during the next Dancing Flash.

abilities.name: Sweeping Dive
abilities.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is selected), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using Jetpack to trigger Pummel.

While falling, deal damage equal to **95%** of ATK + **5** each hit and continuously consume endurance.

abilities.name: Waltz
abilities.description: Tap and hold attack to deal damage equal to **104.5%** of ATK + **6** each time the target is hit. The last hit deals damage equal to **190%** of ATK + **10**. Gain **hyperbody** during this time and continuously consume endurance.

abilities.name: Dance Form
abilities.description: After dodging backward, tap normal attack 3 times consecutively to deal damage equal to **572.8%** of ATK + **30** to the target, and **strongly suspend** the target with the first hit.

abilities.name: Latent State
abilities.description: Dodge before holding to enter Latent State, during which endurance is constantly consumed and speed is increased by **50%**. Increase speed by an additional **50%** in the Chilling Field. When exiting Latent State, deal damage equal to **305.1%** of ATK + **16** to all nearby targets and freeze them for **2** seconds.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, cooldown 15 seconds, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

abilities.name: Cold Field
abilities.description:
Pull nearby enemies together, then deal damage equal to **857.7%** of ATK + **45** to them and **strongly suspend** them. The Wanderer enters the Chilling Field for **30** seconds. Cooldown: **25** seconds. Gain hyperbody while the skill is active.

***Passive***: When using any frost weapon discharge skill in the Chilling Field, deal Hoarfrost Damage equal to **125.8%** of ATK + **7** 1 time and slow the target for **2** seconds (the slow effect is ineffective against bosses). While in the field, for every **12** times Unyielding Wing's hit effect is triggered, further triggers Spatial Slice, dealing damage equal to **165%** of ATK + **9** 1 time to targets in the space every 2 seconds for **25** seconds (this also stops when the space disappears).

abilities.name: Starry Night
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge is full*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, switching to this weapon **removes all debuffs from the wielder** and unleashes a discharge skill, dealing damage equal to **553.2%** of ATK + **29** and **strongly launching** the target, during which damage immunity lasts for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

recommendedMatrices.name: Alyss
recommendedMatrices.description: Very high damage buff set effects.

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set effects for both shatter and consistent damage increase. Use 4 set for quick fights, otherwise pair with 2-set Samir or 2-set Crow.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: High damage matrix set when you have high crit rate.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
